column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////We came right when they opened for brunch on a Sunday. And
column2: my original feelings for the food stands. It's not really that great. It's relies on being very sweet and/or very fatty
column3: but doesn't really taste good. I had the meatloaf hash and it just tasted like bacon fat. Bite after bite
column4: the same flavor of just straight bacon fat. My husband has the Sunday scramble
column5: and was like "why are my eggs the consistency of super super ground meat and taste like nothing?"
